subject: Officiating (Sports)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Game 6 of the 2002 N.B.A. Western Conference finals was a master class in bad calls, missed calls and miscalls that was sloppy enough to undermine the notion that it was planned ineptitude.
snippet: Game 6 of the 2002 N.B.A. Western Conference finals was a master class in bad calls, missed calls and miscalls that was sloppy enough to undermine the notion that it was planned ineptitude.
